responses.rationale: Factual reporting of events and numbers without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of procedure and quote using standard terminology.
Factual description of virus characteristics ('deadly', 'spread rapidly') without explicit amplification.
Factual report of a recommendation without explicit framing.
Contains explicit Reassuring cue ('risk to people is low').
Factual reporting of numbers without explicit framing cues.
Factual statement about price increase without explicit framing.
Quote about business practice without explicit framing.
Quote about business action without explicit framing.

Factual report of cases; 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
